page.title: 18CHANGES IN STEWARTBY
page.content: community and a traditional way of life. 5.{Conclusion} Contrary to the view of the Hanson Trust, we believe that the take over by a multi-million-pound conglomerate will have significant social and economic consequences. The LBC is not the company it used to be. At one time it was interested in making bricks and in the welfare of the village. Now it seems only interested in profit at the end of the year. It remains to be seen whether this will be at the expense of the traditional community values.
